name: code-mode-toon
description: Lightweight MCP orchestrator with TOON compression (30-90% token savings) and lazy loading for efficient AI agent workflows
author: Ziad Hassan <ziad.hassan.dev@gmail.com> (https://github.com/ziad-hsn)

scripts.build: tsc && npm run build:workflows && chmod +x dist/code-mode-toon-server.js
scripts.build:workflows: tsc .workflows/*.ts --outDir dist/.workflows --target ES2022 --module NodeNext --moduleResolution NodeNext --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck && cp dist/.workflows/.workflows/* dist/.workflows/ && rm -rf dist/.workflows/.workflows dist/.workflows/src
